note: economies will exhibit similar features in the timing, length, and amplitude of their fluctuations.
title: Countries that have a similar portfolio of sectors in their national economies will behave in similar ways at the same stage in the SuperCycle. So South Africa, Brazil, and Australia, due to the importance of their industrial commodity industries, will exhibit greater comovement at all times in their economies than, say, Brazil and Germany, or South Korea and South Africa
